sentences.en: After cooking the fish, pour off any excess fat.
sentences.cn: 烹完鱼后，倒掉多余的油。

sentences.en: After you apply the oil, wait 20 minutes before wiping off any excess.
sentences.cn: 涂上油以后，等20分钟再擦掉多余部分。

sentences.en: An excess of fat in one's diet can lead to heart disease.
sentences.cn: 饮食中脂肪过量能导致心脏病.

sentences.en: Are you suffering from an excess of stress in your life?
sentences.cn: 你生活中的压力太大吗？

sentences.en: Avoid deposits in excess of £20,000 in any one account.
sentences.cn: 单一账户存款勿超过两万英镑。

sentences.en: Cut any excess fat from the meat.
sentences.cn: 将肉中多余的肥肉切掉。

sentences.en: He advised his son never to spend in excess of his income.
sentences.cn: 他劝儿子开支不可超过收入.

sentences.en: Make sure that you don't have to pay expensive excess charges.
sentences.cn: 确保你不需要支付昂贵的额外费用。

sentences.en: Polyunsaturated oils are essential for health. Excess is harmful, however.
sentences.cn: 多不饱和油对健康很重要。但是，食用过量就会有害。

sentences.en: Red meat, eaten to excess, is very high in fat and calories.
sentences.cn: 过量食用的红肉中脂肪和卡路里含量很高。

sentences.en: Shake off any excess flour before putting livers in the pan.
sentences.cn: 将多余的面粉抖落干净，再把肝脏放进锅中。

sentences.en: she insisted that he did not drink to excess.
sentences.cn: 她坚持叫他不要喝过了量。

sentences.en: Staff who have to travel farther can claim excess travel expenses.
sentences.cn: 需要到更远的地方出差的职员可以领取额外差旅费。

sentences.en: The car reached speeds in excess of 100 miles per hour.
sentences.cn: 这辆汽车的时速超过了100英里。

sentences.en: The government was unable to curb the excesses of the secret police.
sentences.cn: 政府无法约束秘密警察的过分行为。

sentences.en: The ridged design of the pan allows excess fat to drain off.
sentences.cn: 平底锅的凸纹设计使多余的油能够控出。

sentences.en: the worst excesses of journalism
sentences.cn: 新闻工作中那些最糟糕的越轨行为

sentences.en: This excess fungal yeast irritates the scalp, causing overproduction of skin cells.
sentences.cn: 这过量的真菌酵母刺激皮肤产生了过多的皮肤细胞.

sentences.en: Trim off the excess pastry using a sharp knife.
sentences.cn: 用一把快刀切去多余的饼皮。

sentences.en: unit sales in excess of 20 million.
sentences.cn: 股票售价超过两千万

sentences.en: Wipe off any excess make-up with a clean, moist cotton flannel.
sentences.cn: 用干净的湿绒布擦去多余的化妆品。

sentences.en: You'll have to pay excess postal charges on this letter.
sentences.cn: 这封信你必须付超重邮资.

sentences.en: You're too fat; try and run off all those excess pounds.
sentences.cn: 你太胖了, 要跑跑步减肥.

words.tran_cn: 超过，超额；过度，过量；无节制

phrases.tran_cn: 过剩空气系数，过量空气系数
超额生产能力；过剩设备
过负荷，超荷载；逾量荷载

trans.tran_en: additional and not needed because there is already enough of something
a larger amount of something than is allowed or needed
a larger amount of something than is allowed or needed
